title: The BEST Holiday Tech Deals! (2017)
description: My favorite tech of 2017 -  The Best Cyber Monday 2017 Tech Deals!  Status CB-1 ($55) -   Austin Evans on sale -  1st Gen Google Pixel for $459 -   Amazon Fire 7 Tablet for $29 -   Sennheiser HD 579 Open Back Headphones ($99) -   Bose Soundsport Wireless Headphones for $99 -   12 MacBook (Early 2016) for $999 -  - 1.2GHz dual-core Intel Core M-6Y54 processor (Turbo Boost up to 2.7GHz) with 4MB shared L3 cache - 512GB PCI-E based flash memory storage - 8GB of 1600MHz LPDDR3 onboard memory - Intel HD Graphics 515 processor for an outstanding everyday graphics experience.  Herschel Supply Co - Spend $60/Get $20 Off | Spend $110/Get $40 Off | Spend $140/Get $60 Off -   Urban Outfitters $50 off purchase $150   - EP-33 Bluetooth Turntable = $119.99 after discount  - Silver XR1 NMDs $110 after discount -   Philips Hue White Starter Kit + Motion Sensor for $67 -    2nd Generation Amazon Echo for $79 -  Echo Dot for $29 -  Echo Plus for $119 w/a Philips Hue Bulb -   25% of iPhone X, GS8, Note 8 Cases -   Xbox One S ($189) -   DJI Spark Bundle for $399 -   Samsung 128GB MicroSD Card for $36 -   GoPro Hero5 Black for $349 -  - Video: 4K30 / 2.7K60 / 1440p80 / 1080p120 / 960p120 / 720p240. - Photo: 12MP / 30 fps Burst. - Waterproof to 33ft (10m).  Seneo Wireless Charger for $25.99 -   Background music via Epidemic Sound:   My Audio Setup & Gear:   Add me on Snapchat!  My Gear:  Instagram:  Twitter:
